title: Hey Pandas, AITA For Feeling Betrayed By My Best Friend And Wanting Space?
description: I’m a 21F in my third year of university, juggling finals, internships, and a nonexistent sleep schedule, and I’ve somehow stumbled into a friendship crisis I never expected.
